title: Bug 7752: Export multiple files with same file name under different directories to zip file fails.
OB: In the 'Export' dialog window, when selecting both projects created earlier and giving the zip file a name (such as test.zip), the export to zip file fails. An error message box pops up stating that problems were encountered during the export, and the detail lists the file with the same name in project 2 as the problem.
EB: The zip file should be able to store files with the same name under different directories.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the 'Export' dialog window. 2. Select both projects created earlier. 3. Provide a name for the zip file. 4. Proceed with the export to zip file.
